tasks.label: Auto Test on Save
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch --quiet && cargo watch -x "test" -w nanokit/src

tasks.label: Auto Coverage on Save
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch --quiet && cargo install cargo-tarpaulin --quiet && cargo watch -x "tarpaulin --skip-clean --out Xml --out Html --engine llvm --target-dir target/coverage-build" -w nanokit/src

tasks.label: Generate Code Coverage
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-tarpaulin --quiet && cargo tarpaulin --skip-clean --out Xml --out Html --engine llvm --target-dir target/coverage-build
